===Verb===

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[written]] or [[composed]] by the [[royal]] [[hand]] (of an [[emperor]])

===Usage notes===
Usually refers to a poem which has been added to a famous painting. This phrase may be used if the emperor either composed the poem, wrote the poem in his own calligraphy, or both.
